title: i cant connect to games
body: i started a game and when i got into the game, around 20 minutes i disconnected from the game and I didnt connect back to it for a while, so i tried to reset it, but then the game said it couldnt connect to the internet even though i was clearly connected. this happened in the loading screen

replies.body:
Since you were disconnected on the loading screen, it seems like your network is having a hard time reconnecting to the game server you were on for some reason. Sometimes your own internet can be in perfect shape, but it can still have issues connecting to certain servers for a variety of reasons.

Take a look over our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can stabilize your connection to our servers and get you back on the Rift.
